name: Airplane Duel
description:
Airplane Duel is a 2 player air combat game with easy controls and flight physics!

Shoot down the balloon or your opponent's plane!

How to Play:

Choose Training (Singleplayer) or Duel (Multiplayer).

Dual mode will setup a connection via Game Center with a second iPad, iPhone or iPod touch.

- Press the FIRE Button to take off.
- Use the ARROW Buttons to head nose up and down.
- Be careful: If you climb too fast, you'll stall!
- The game is over when one plane scores 15 points.
